data.title: DWTS' Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy share exciting baby news
data.meta_description: Dancing with the Stars' Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy have announced that they are expecting a third baby boy, and they want fans' help with the name.
data.text:
Xochitl Gomez Dances The Foxtrot On Dancing With The Stars

Dancing with the Stars' Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy have announced their expecting a third baby boy.

On Thursday, the ABC dance pros shared a sweet video in a joint Instagram post revealing the sex of their third child they are soon to welcomg into the family.

The couple had several ways of revealing the sex of their baby, including blue balloons, confetti cannons and a cake with blue candy.

"It's a ……..BOY!" Murgatroyd wrote in the caption of the post. "I've been quietly preparing myself to be a real-life wolf pack Mumma with our THIRD baby boy on the way."

She continued: "I CANNOT BELIEVE WE WILL HAVE 3 BOYS!! Maks and I are beyond happy to have another buddy for Shai and Rio…we want them to be the best of friends and thinking about family dinners already makes us laugh!"

Read more: DWTS’ Derek Hough makes emotional tribute to wife Hayley after Emmy win

Follow Daily Express US on Google News

Click here to follow Daily Express US on Google News to stay up to date with all the latest US, showbiz, and sports news.

"Not to mention when Rio turns 1, I will give birth to this bundle of joy a couple of weeks later," she said. "LET THE GAMES BEGIN."

She concluded the caption by asking her followers to share their name suggestions in the comments with "3,4,5 letters."

In February, Murgatroyd shared that they were expecting another baby after welcoming their second son, Rio John Chmerkovskiy, in June 2023, through in vitro fertilization.

The couple are also parents to son Shai Chmerkovskiy, whom they welcomed in January 2017.

They previously opened up about their "constant struggle and heartache" to have a second child.

In their Instagram post revealing the news that they were expecting again, Murgatroyd said she and Chmerkovskiy are "beyond blessed and know we are uber lucky for this miracle to happen to us."

DON'T MISS:

Derek Hough celebrates Sister Julianne with wife Hayley after health scare [LATEST]

DWTS host Julianne Hough narrowly dodges humiliating accident [WATCH]

Derek Hough's wife 'cherishing precious gift of life' after terrifying surgery [INSIGHT]

She wrote: "Yes we know…we just had a baby… haha! This was very unexpected at (4 months postpartum with Rio) but we are sooooo happy and so ready to be a family of 5 soon!

"Surpising @maksimc on this FaceTime with my two friends secretly filming from different angles made it all the more hilarious. It took one hour for me to get the courage to call him and when he wasn’t catching on we all couldn’t stop laughing in the kitchen. I had the 'I’m so sick story' the pickle and 2 bottles HAHA! Oh Maks

"After everything we’ve been through with miscarriages and IVF we’re beyond blessed and know we are uber lucky for this miracle to happen to us. We’re just so happy that we can finally tell you guys the good news."

Fans took to the comments section to share their name ideas as Murgatroyd requested.

One person has a pretty good suggestion: "Pax - combines Peta & Maks and means peace or peaceful."

Another fan suggested: "Nico or Luka."

A third agreed Nico would be good in their comment: "Alec or Nico."

Meanwhile, a fourth added: "I love the name Rhys."

The pro dancers will surely have their hands full with three boys.
